definition: rechecking/re-inspection/reexamination
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
to repeat/to double/to overlap/complex (not simple)/compound/composite/double/diplo-/duplicate/overlapping/to duplicate
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
surname Zha
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
see 山查[shan1 zha1]

sentences.english: When reexamined, no trace of cancer was found.
sentences.chinese: 复查时已没有癌症的迹象。

sentences.english: Want to check to bughouse regularly here.
sentences.chinese: 此间要定期到精神病院复查。

sentences.english: These arrangements are subject to periodic reviews.
sentences.chinese: 这几项安排每隔一定时间须予复查。

sentences.english: Conclusion False-negative and suspicious types in embryo-cardiac surveillance could be decreased if the gravida eat before the test.
sentences.chinese: 结论可通过进食后复查来减少假阴性与可疑型病例。

sentences.english: Come back again next week for the results and another check of your blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 一周后来复诊看化验结果和复查血压。

sentences.english: My baby one month of the BCG , has not been review.
sentences.chinese: 我的孩子满月时种的卡介苗，一直没有进行复查。

sentences.english: Reviewing and comparing with the previous specimen will be helpful.
sentences.chinese: 复查前次手术的病理样本并与此次相比较将很有帮助。

sentences.english: The process of review and verification on install can be tedious.
sentences.chinese: 安装的复查和验证过程可能会十分单调乏味。

sentences.english: Yes, of course. You have the right of reinspection .
sentences.chinese: 请你告诉我，货物抵达或买方是否有权复查？

sentences.english: More frequent follow-up visits may be necessary, depending on your condition.
sentences.chinese: 根据您的情况，经常性的复查是有必要的。

sentences.english: For groups A and B, all above indices were measured again after 2 weeks of treatment.
sentences.chinese: 常规治疗组和卡维地洛组治疗2周后复查上述指标。

sentences.english: Let me re-review after a period of time.
sentences.chinese: 让我过一段时间再复查。

sentences.english: All aspects of design work should be checked and rechecked.
sentences.chinese: 设计工作的各个方面都应该检查和复查。

sentences.english: But the practice, known as passenger profiling, is controversial.
sentences.chinese: 不过这项名为乘客案底的复查手段却备受争议。

sentences.english: The higher people's court may review decisions of the local court.
sentences.chinese: 高级人民法院可以复查地方法院的判决。

sentences.english: Yes, of course. Your have the right of reinspection.

definition: another visit to doctor/further diagnosis
inspection/to examine/to inspect/CL:次[ci4]
to accompany/(of a doctor etc) to do a follow-up (on a patient, client etc)
to make a definite diagnosis/confirmed (case of a specific disease)
abbr. for 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
to leave hospital/to be discharged from hospital
chemical examination/to do a lab test
see 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
to follow the doctor's advice/as instructed by the physician
biopsy/abbr. for 活體組織檢查|活体组织检查[huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2]
to receive hospital treatment/to be hospitalized
to do a blood test/to have one's blood tested
echography/ultrasound scan
to recur (of a disease)/to reappear/to relapse (into a former bad state)
diagnosis/to diagnose
to enter hospital/to be hospitalized
